oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mary Camp Webster
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Head and shoulders of Mary Camp Webster, wife of Richard Cross Gordon, a Second Lieutenant in the 11th Tennessee Infantry. She was born on November 16, 1840, and died on May 16, 1935. She married Richard Cross Gordon on August 20, 1863. She lived in Cross Bridges and Columbia area, Maury County, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
